description:
Set sail on your Black Skylands adventure with exclusive pre-order content! This special bonus pack is reserved for early explorers who pre-order the game, providing valuable items and resources to elevate your journey to soaring heights!
• Make a bold statement in the skies with the 'Golden Erne' Bow.
• Explore uncharted territories of the floating islands using the Swarmlit Hook.
• Take your weapons to the next level with the Special Mod-Chest's exclusive Tier 3 upgrade.
• Prepare for the challenges ahead with Extra Steel - a valuable resource to upgrade your equipment and enhance your arsenal.
name: Black Skylands: Pre-Order Bonus Pack
